summary: This is a weapon mod for skyrim. The swords, battle axe, and shield are all craftable from a forge. I tried to make these weapons as close to my ancestors as i could with my own design. Steel smithing is required to make these awesome Norse weapons, and dwarven is required to temper them. Comment and rate!
descriptionHtml:
This is a weapon mod for skyrim. The swords, battle axe, and shields are all craftable from a forge. I tried to make these weapons as close to my ancestors as i could with my own design. Steel smithing is required to make these awesome Norse weapons, and dwarven is required to temper them. 

Please comment endorse and vote for it that\'s how i know ya guys like it or not!

My mod is also on the Steam Workshop for those that enjoy a less hands on approach. http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=86969863

UPDATE 1: Texture improvements and a new 1h axe

HOW TO INSTALL:

Unzip the file, and add both files into your Skyrim data folder and happy killing!
author: Asguardviking
